title: 1976 Adventure - Escape from Angola - Film directed by Leslie H. Martinson

sources.title: 1976 Adventure - Escape from Angola - Film directed by Leslie H. Martinson
sources.description:
The Mallory family, led by James, must navigate the dangers of the African wilderness after their truck is sabotaged during a rebellion. Facing wild animals and armed threats, they fight to protect their mission and each other.

Original title: Escape from Angola (1976)
Alternative title: Return to Africa

Director: Leslie H. Martinson
Writers: Barry Clark (screenplay), George Gale (story)

Main cast:
Stan Brock - James Mallory
Anne Collings - Karen Mallory
Steven Tors - Steve Mallory
Peter Tors - Peter Mallory
David Tors - Dave Mallory

Genres: Adventure, Drama
Release date: December 1976
Filming location: South Africa


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
